english: Index all the quoted names in a book .
chinese: 把书中提到的所有人名编入索引。
自然而然地，人们提到了马特。

english: There is constant reference to blood in plays .
She needs to pronounce his name frequently .
Put this item on our daily work schedule .
chinese: 把这项工作提到议事日程上来。
提到造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Paddy's heart seemed to block his throat .
chinese: 帕迪的心提到了喉咙口。

english: It is instructive to present both these views .
chinese: 先提到这两点是很有意义的。

english: I set him off by mentioning pound .
chinese: 我提到了庞德，把他惹火了。

english: Did he say anything about his property ?
I spoke of my lady a line or two back .
Joe has also heard of kidney stones .
chinese: 乔也听人提到过肾结石。

english: She reminded me of our long talks under the trees .
chinese: 她提到我们在树下的长谈。

english: He did not like anyone to mention the deformity .
chinese: 他不喜欢人家提到他的缺陷。

english: You make no reference to your plan in your letter .
chinese: 你信里没有提到你的计划。

english: The woman in question is sitting over there .
chinese: 提到的那个女的就在那里坐着呢。
